channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Endpoint Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Endpoint Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-8441|2024-09-12T03:55:23.682Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: An uncontrolled search path in the agent of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a local authenticated attacker with admin privileges to escalate their privileges to SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-8191|2024-09-12T03:55:08.946Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: SQL injection in the management console of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-8191|2024-09-11T14:40:31.564Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: SQL injection in the management console of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-8321|2024-09-11T14:30:43.886Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Missing authentication in Network Isolation of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to isolate managed devices from the network.

item.title: CVE-2024-8320|2024-09-11T14:32:51.777Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Missing authentication in Network Isolation of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to spoof Network Isolation status of managed devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-8322|2024-09-10T20:59:40.339Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Weak authentication in Patch Management of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-8441|2024-09-10T21:01:09.475Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: An uncontrolled search path in the agent of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a local authenticated attacker with admin privileges to escalate their privileges to SYSTEM.

item.description: Missing authentication in Network Isolation of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to spoof Network Isolation status of managed devices.

item.description: Missing authentication in Network Isolation of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to isolate managed devices from the network.

item.title: CVE-2024-8191|2024-09-10T20:50:24.547Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: SQL injection in the management console of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote code execution.

item.description: An uncontrolled search path in the agent of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a local authenticated attacker with admin privileges to escalate their privileges to SYSTEM.
